de.rwth.i2.attestor.strategies

Class GeneralAnalysisTaskBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rwth.i2.attestor.strategies.GeneralAnalysisTaskBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnalysisTaskBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultAnalysisTaskBuilder, IndexedAnalysisTaskBuilder

    public abstract class GeneralAnalysisTaskBuilder
extends Object
implements AnalysisTaskBuilder
    Implementation of most common functionality to create and customize an AnalysisTaskBuilder.
    Author:
    Christoph

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected HeapConfiguration input
      The initial heap configuration that -- together with the initial program location -- determines the initial state of the heap configuration.
      protected Program program
      The program that should be analyzed.
      protected int scopeDepth
      The initial depth of the scope.
